description: Renames an existing column in a datatable.

input.name: data
input.description: A datatable which contains columns to be renamed.

input.name: mappings
input.description: A datatable which contains the following columns: `old column`, `old value`, `new column`, and `new value`.

input.name: discard
input.description: Specifies whether to discard columns which are not included in `mappings`. Defaults to `true`.

output.name: data
output.description: A new datatable with the columns mapped.
